alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:53PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Fremont, southeastern Teller and southwestern El Paso Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 453 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Fort Carson, or 11 miles southwest of Colorado Springs, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Fremont, southeastern Teller and southwestern El Paso Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
